bill.summary:
Merit Systems Protection Board Reauthorization Act of 2018
This bill reauthorizes the Merit Systems Protection Board (MSPB) for FY2019-FY2023. Additionally, the bill modifies the authority of the MSPB and directs it to establish a filing fee for claims.
